quote: Of course you know, this means war.
author: Joe Adamson,  Bugs Bunny Fifty Years And Only One Grey Hare

quote: We often participate in a war only to lose our hearts and to gain a few pieces of land.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: War [10w] Fight wars not to win, but so our enemies don't.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The life of the enemy . Whoever lives for the sake of combating an enemy has an interest in the enemy's staying alive.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: War is what happens when language fails.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: There will come a time in your life when you lose something that matters to you. You'll fight for it and you won't win. But what really matters isn't the war you're waging, it's that you don't lose the person you are in the midst of the battle.
author: J. Sterling,  The Perfect Game

quote: When every heart is filled with peace and every mind is searching for peace, how can there be war?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The art of war is of vital importance to the state. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
author: George Orwell,  1984

quote: There is no man, and no place, without war. The only thing we can do is choose a side, and fight. That is the only choice we get - who we fight for, who we fight against. That is life.
author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram

quote: War is not just the business of death, it is the antitheses of life.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: To win peace, fight with love not with violence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How is it possible to have a civil war?
author: George Carlin

quote: Older men declare war. But it is youth that must fight and die.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: We both have war inside us. Sometimes it keeps us alive. Sometimes it threatens to destroy us.
author: Veronica Roth,  Insurgent

quote: The enduring attraction of war is this: Even with its destruction and carnage it can give us what we long for in life. It can give us purpose, meaning, a reason for living.
author: Chris Hedges,  War Is a Force That Gives Us Meaning

quote: They're in love. Fuck the war.
author: Thomas Pynchon,  Gravity's Rainbow

quote: War is not for winning, Masha,"sighed Koschei, reading the tracks of supply lines, of pincer strategies, over her shoulder. "It is for surviving.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  Deathless

quote: Love's War [10w] In love's war there aren't winners and losers ~just casualties.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Peace is a road to happiness and the future.War is a road to destruction and death.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: War [10w] When leaders threaten war,they’re breaking dirt on our graves.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: War is the greatest evil Satan has invented to corrupt our hearts and souls. We should honor our soldiers, but we should never honor war.
author: Dean Hughes,  Far From Home

quote: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact; to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: And if humanity is the last war, then I am the battlefield.
author: Rick Yancey,  The 5th Wave

quote: War is just when it is necessary; arms are permissible when there is no hope except in arms.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Helplessness induces hopelessness, and history attests that loss of hope and not loss of lives is what decides the issue of war.
author: B. H. Liddell Hart

quote: Conflict is inevitable but combat is optional.
author: Max Lucado,  When God Whispers Your Name

quote: The war for peace can destroy the whole world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: War Game. You can count the dead, but will never have a winner or a loser. #Thinkpeace
author: Secli G

quote: They say that war is death's best friend, but I must offer you a different point of view on that one. To me, war is like the new boss who expects the impossible. He stands over your shoulder repeating one thin, incessantly: 'Get it done, get it done.' So you work harder. You get the job done. The boss, however, does not thank you. He asks for more.
author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quote: War is thus divine in itself, since it is a law of the world. War is divine through its consequences of a supernatural nature which are as much general as particular. War is divine in the mysterious glory that surrounds it and in the no less inexplicable attraction that draws us to it. War is divine by the manner in which it breaks out.
author: Joseph de Maistre

quote: If our purpose of life is live in peace and happiness, then why are we always preparing for war?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The Warrior's Way To the warrior,peace is an annoying interruption of war.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To live is - to war with trolls In the holds of the heart and mind
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: I started to make a study of the art of war and revolution and, whilst abroad, underwent a course in military training. If there was to be guerrilla warfare, I wanted to be able to stand and fight with my people and to share the hazards of war with them.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Love is like war, except without all the blood and death and stuff.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: The harder the battle; The Greater the Blessing
author: Denise Difalco

quote: Going to war to establish peace will not bring peace. It will just kill you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your war drum ain't / louder than this breath.
author: Suheir Hammad,  Zaatardiva

quote: The whole art of war consists of guessing at what is on the other side of the hill.
author: Arthur Wellesley

quote: To stop war, teach peace, love, cooperation, and most of all—forgiveness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are truly living when you have inner peace. You are far away from the beauty of life when you are fighting a war.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The war to preserve the privilege of mythmaking
author: Marvin Bell,  Mars Being Red

quote: To live in peace, love peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: War must be, while we defend our lives against a destroyer who would devour all; but I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Two Towers

quote: Religion isn't the cause of wars, it's the excuse.
author: Jasper Fforde,  The Eyre Affair

quote: That's not a bad word...hate and war are bad words, but fuck isn't.
author: Judy Blume,  Forever

quote: The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.
author: Shannon L. Alder
